oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Candle holder
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Civil War era candle holder. A note on the back dates it 1865. The note states that it was "brought from Ky. by Mattie Cary Sweeny" and it "was used during the war to indicate a friendly house to soldiers on the road." Matilda (Mattie) Cary Sweeny was married to John A. Winfrey. Winfrey served in Co. D, 6th Tenn. Infantry, CSA.
